eidolonunchained.codex.entry.text_exampl: This is a simple text example showing how to create codex entries.
Text entries are the simplest type of codex content. They display formatted text to the reader.
eidolonunchained.codex.entry.recipe_exam: Learn how to display crafting recipes in your codex entries.
Recipe pages automatically display crafting grids and ingredients.
eidolonunchained.codex.entry.entity_exam: This entry demonstrates how to display entities in the codex.
This example demonstrates how to show entity information.
eidolonunchained.codex.entry.shadow_comm: Commune with Nyxathel the Shadow Lord through dark rituals. This chant opens a direct communication channel with the deity of shadows.
Draw the signs of Wicked, Wicked, and Blood to establish contact with the shadow realm.
eidolonunchained.codex.entry.divine_comm: Seek guidance from Lumina the Sacred Guardian. This blessed chant allows communication with the deity of light and protection.
Draw the signs of Sacred, Harmony, and Warding to call upon divine blessing.
eidolonunchained.codex.entry.natures_com: Connect with Verdania, Guardian of Nature. This chant harmonizes your spirit with the natural world.
Draw the signs of Harmony, Soul, and Sacred to commune with nature's guardian.
eidolonunchained.codex.entry.divine_judg: A powerful offensive chant that calls upon divine power to destroy the wicked.
Channel the wrath of the divine to strike down evil. Draw the signs of Sacred, Flame, and Death to invoke divine judgment.
eidolonunchained.codex.entry.gaias_wrath: A destructive chant that channels the earth's anger against those who would harm the natural world.
Unleash the fury of the earth itself. Draw the signs of Harmony, Flame, and Death to invoke nature's devastating power.
eidolonunchained.codex.entry.forbidden_k: A dangerous chant that reveals hidden knowledge at a terrible price.
Seek out secrets that should remain hidden. Draw the signs of Wicked, Mind, and Magic to access forbidden lore.
eidolonunchained.codex.entry.crucible_ex: The Eidolon Crucible can be used to create enhanced magical items through careful alchemical processes.
Enhanced Shadow Gems require careful preparation using dark essence and corrupted materials.
Nature Soul Gems are created by infusing natural materials with elemental energies.
eidolonunchained.codex.entry.enhanced_sh: These powerful gems are infused with shadow magic and can be used to craft advanced items.
Warning: Handling these gems requires careful preparation and protection from corruption.
eidolonunchained.codex.entry.nature_patr: A sacred ritual to establish connection with Verdania, Guardian of Nature.
Successfully completing this ritual grants Nature Patronage and allows communion with Verdania.
eidolonunchained.codex.page.nature_patro: The Nature Patronage Ritual requires creating a sacred grove and offering natural treasures to Verdania.
eidolonunchained.codex.entry.light_patro: A sacred ritual to establish connection with Lumina, the Sacred Guardian.
Successfully completing this ritual grants Light Patronage and allows communion with Lumina.
eidolonunchained.codex.page.light_patron: The Light Patronage Ritual requires creating a sacred altar and offering divine treasures to Lumina.
eidolonunchained.codex.entry.shadow_patr: A dangerous ritual to establish connection with Nyxathel, the Shadow Lord.
Successfully completing this ritual grants Shadow Patronage and allows communion with Nyxathel.
eidolonunchained.codex.page.shadow_patro: The Shadow Patronage Ritual requires creating a dark altar and offering forbidden treasures to Nyxathel.
eidolonunchained.codex.entry.deity_ritua: The three primary deities each offer unique rituals and powers to their faithful followers.
Verdania, Guardian of Nature, offers growth, healing, and natural protection.
Lumina, Sacred Guardian, provides divine protection, purification, and holy power.
Nyxathel, Shadow Lord, grants forbidden knowledge, dark magic, and power over shadows.
Each deity offers tasks and challenges that grow in complexity as your devotion increases.
eidolonunchained.research.entry.simple_e: A basic example of the research system

eidolonunchained.research.entry.divine_p: A holy ritual to gain Lumina's blessing and cleanse the soul
eidolonunchained.research.entry.shadow_e: A dangerous ritual to gain power from Nyxathel, the Shadow Lord

A sacred chant that opens communication with the Light Deity, Lumina.
